metadata.name: Read Contents From Stdin Via Cmd.EXE
metadata.comment: Detect the use of "<" to read and potentially execute a file via cmd.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cmd.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('<')))

output.summary: Detect the use of "<" to read and potentially execute a file via cmd.exe
